entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
